HireEasy is your one-stop solution to find trusted domestic help like maids, drivers, cooks, and more. We provide verified profiles at just ₹20, with no hidden costs or risks. Fast. Safe. Reliable.
How do I hire a servant?
Go to your interested profile > click 'View profile' > pay ₹20 to access mobile number and address.
How can I contact a servant?
After unlocking, you will see their mobile number and contact them directly.
Is there a refund if the profile is inactive?
No, all payments are non-refundable. You may report the profile if it's inactive.
How do I give feedback or complaints?
Use the 'Send Feedback' option in the main menu or email us at [hireesay1@gmail.com].
